metadata.Title: CVE-2017-12087 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description:
An exploitable heap overflow vulnerability exists in the tinysvcmdns library version 2016-07-18. A specially crafted packet can make the library overwrite an arbitrary amount of data on the heap with attacker controlled values. An attacker needs send a dns packet to trigger this vulnerability.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-12087` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

shairport-sync - 3.1.4-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: shairport-sync package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.1.4-1').
